== Using Toolbar Buttons ==

*itSimple* includes toolbars to help you perform common tasks quickly. When you point and pause over a button using the mouse, *itSimple *displays the name of the button in a Tooltip. Simply click the button to carry out the command.

https://my-project-probando.googlecode.com/svn/toolbars.png
